description: This file defines a Flutter widget named CategoryLinearProgress that displays a budget, spent amount, and a progress bar for a specific financial category, based on data from a CategoryBreakdownItem model.

classes.name: CategoryLinearProgress
classes.description: A stateless widget that visually represents the budget and spent amounts for a category through a progress bar and textual info.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree that displays the category name, spent, budgeted values, and the progress indicator.
